meanings.sent1: The bright colors made the painting very seeable.
meanings.sent2: The seeable stars twinkled in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The seeable cat tried to hide behind the small plant.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness was seeable in her radiant smile.
meanings.sent5: The seeable rainbow stretched across the sky after the rainstorm.

meanings.sent1: The seeable sign guided us to the correct path.
meanings.sent2: The seeable details in the artwork amazed the viewers.
meanings.sent3: The seeable butterfly fluttered gracefully in the garden.
meanings.sent4: His talent was seeable in every brushstroke of the painting.
meanings.sent5: The seeable waves crashed against the shore, creating a mesmerizing sight.
